# Cameron Spencer

> Staff Software Engineer and AI Engineer based in Philadelphia. Builds AI-powered tools, MCP servers, and fullstack applications with TypeScript, React, Next.js, Python, and LLM frameworks.

## Contact

- Email: 13spencerc@gmail.com
- Website: https://camspencer.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/chuckle123
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/cameronmspencer/

## Skills

AI & LLM: Claude Code (skills, sub-agents), MCP, Claude API, Gemini API, Vercel AI SDK, Langfuse, Cursor, Langchain, Langgraph
Languages & Frameworks: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, SQL, React, Next.js, Node.js
Infrastructure & Data: Docker, Postgres, dbt, Redis, Azure Event Hub, tRPC, GraphQL, REST, Jest

## Experience

Staff AI Software Engineer at Token Terminal (Mar 2025 - Feb 2026)
- Built MCP server for blockchain analytics, reducing tool count from 10+ to 4 and context per call from ~20,000 tokens to ~200
- Designed semantic discovery layer with SQLite/FTS5 for entity resolution across thousands of entities
- Engineered text-to-SQL agent over a 2PB BigQuery data warehouse
- Automated data warehouse documentation generation for improved agent query accuracy

Staff Software Engineer / Tech Lead at The Rounds (Jun 2022 - Mar 2025)
- Backed by A16Z, Redpoint Ventures, Modern Ventures
- Halved warehouse packing times with batch session support
- Increased average order value by 31% through flexible delivery days
- Cut order pack errors by 65%, enabling delivery of 5MM+ products
- Built AI customer service platform using Langchain and tool calling
- Led warehouse consolidation reducing operational costs by 10% weekly

Senior Software Engineer / Tech Lead at Gopuff (Apr 2021 - Jun 2022)
- Backed by SoftBank Vision Fund, Guggenheim Investments, Accel
- Delivered scheduled delivery feature and driver forecasting model streamlining 2MM rides yearly
- Built platform-agnostic ordering system, launching Uber Eats integration increasing revenue by 8%

Co-Founder & CTO at Vitris LLC (Jan 2018 - Apr 2021)
- Amassed $100K in grants and reached $15K monthly recurring revenue

## Education

Drexel University — Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

## Projects

MCP Server for Blockchain Analytics: TypeScript, MCP, Claude API — Progressive disclosure pattern reducing agent context overhead
Text-to-SQL Agent: Python, BigQuery, LLM — Natural language to SQL over 2PB of undocumented tables
Semantic Discovery Layer: SQLite, FTS5 — Full-text search for ambiguous entity resolution
AI Customer Service Platform: TypeScript, Langchain — Reasoning agent handling common support requests
Warehouse Packing App: React, Next.js — Custom logistics app cutting errors by 65%
Event Ticket Pricing Aggregator: Python, scraping — 400K rows of daily pricing data
